sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.AddressMgmtExtPoint
Extension point for address management features</description>
        <name>AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB = Class.create();
AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getAccountLocationsRefQual: function(account) {
        var addressMgmtUtils = new global.AddressMgmtUtils();
		if(!addressMgmtUtils.isAddressSharingEnabled())
			return 'sys_idISEMPTY';
        var query = 'consumerISEMPTY';
        if (!account)
            return query;
        var locationsForAccHierarchy = addressMgmtUtils.getLocationsForAccHierarchy(account);
        var locationsForAcc = addressMgmtUtils.getLocationsForAccount(account);
        var filteredLocations = locationsForAccHierarchy.filter(
            function(loc) {
                return locationsForAcc.indexOf(loc) < 0;
            });
        return query + '^sys_idIN' + filteredLocations.join(',');
    },

    type: 'AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-13 18:20:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5e2c115f532101100f16ddeeff7b1271</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AddressMgmtExtensionInstanceOOB</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5e2c115f532101100f16ddeeff7b1271</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 17:11:38</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
